entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:01 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
